mapper.select: select * from cart where mem_id=#{mem_id} and cart_show=1
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_cnt, cart_totprice, pro_name, pro_price, pro_desc, pro_image,) values(#{cart_cnt}, #{cart_totprice}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_desc}, #{pro_image})
mapper.update: update cart set cart_cnt=#{cart_cnt} where cart_code = #{cart_code}
